column4: whats up with pidgin? first it wouldn't download the buddy list, which installing msn-pecan solved, now, all my contacts are offline, for 2 days now.  they see me online, but i dont see them. anyone else experiencing this?
pidgin works nicely for me.. but I didn't do the msn-pecan thingy
I haven't done anything special to piding.. I use what's in the repos
